name: mokobi
short_description: A syncml clients, based on the GPL sourcecode from Funambol (www.funambol.com). Mokobi connects your smart phones, syncml capable mobile phones, tablets, notebooks, desktop PCs exchanging your important information – address books, calendar, files; Connects with MS Outlook, Mac software and Linux. Mokobi provides secure and user-friendly web interface to control your information, regular backup and restorе when needed. Never lose an important contact, never miss an important meeting! Never afraid to lose your mobile! Mokobi provides simple registration and fully functional free services (mail, sync, backup, contacts, calendar, tasks, notes, forum and blogs) + advanced paid services – more devices in one account, more syncs, gigs of storage. To access your online account and to manage your Mokobi services go to: www.mokobi.mobi. Platforms supported: Android, BlackBerry, iPhone, Win Mobile, Symbian, SyncML phones, iPad and Android tablets, Windows and Mac computers.
